pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistics: Data Analysis and Modelling // Data sets and functions to support the books "Statistics: Data analysis and modelling" by Speekenbrink, M. (2021) https://mspeekenbrink.github.io/sdam-book/ and "An R companion to Statistics: data analysis and modelling" by Speekenbrink, M. (2021) https://mspeekenbrink.github.io/sdam-r-companion/. All datasets analysed in these books are provided in this package. In addition, the package provides functions to compute sample statistics (variance, standard deviation, mode), create raincloud and enhanced Q-Q plots, and expand Anova results into omnibus tests and tests of individual contrasts.
